snippet: Sony reported a loss of 24.6 billion yen for the April-to-June quarter and lowered its full-year earnings forecast. It has posted losses for four straight years.
abstract: Sony reports fiscal first-quarter loss of 24.6 billion yen ($315 million), compared with a 15.5 billion yen loss in the year-ago quarter; revenue rose 1.4 percent to 1.52 trillion yen ($19.4 billion); lowers its earnings forecast for its fiscal year ending in March 2013 to 20 billion yen ($256 million), down from 30 billion yen.
lead_paragraph: Sony reported a loss of 24.6 billion yen for the April-to-June quarter and lowered its full-year earnings forecast. It has posted losses for four straight years.
